pages.text: There is a chance for $(l:worldgen/plants#walnut_tree)walnut trees$(/l) growing in the Nether to produce leaden walnuts, instead of ordinary ones.
Resting leaden walnuts with an anvil (not consumed) in $(l:intro/counter_with_dolium)dolia$(/l) yields litharge cakes.
Litharge cakes can be smelted into lead nuggets.
